meals.name: Large Oatmeal with Protein, Banana & Nuts
meals.description: 1 cup (dry) quick oats cooked with water or milk, mixed with 1 scoop protein powder, topped with 1 sliced banana and 1/4 cup mixed nuts.

meals.name: Chicken and Veggie Rice Bowl
meals.description: 1.5 cups cooked brown rice, 6oz pan-fried chicken breast, 1 cup steamed broccoli and carrots, with 2 tbsp light soy-ginger dressing.

meals.name: Pasta with Lean Ground Beef and Tomato Sauce
meals.description: 1.5 cups (dry) whole wheat pasta served with a sauce made from 6oz lean ground beef, 1 cup canned crushed tomatoes, 1/2 onion, 2 cloves garlic, and dried herbs.

meals.name: Scrambled Eggs with Whole-Wheat Toast and Avocado
meals.description: 4 large scrambled eggs, 2 slices whole-wheat toast, 1/2 medium avocado. Cook eggs with a dash of milk or water.

meals.name: Leftover Pasta with Lean Ground Beef and Tomato Sauce
meals.description: Reheated leftovers from Monday's dinner.

meals.name: Baked Salmon with Roasted Sweet Potato and Green Beans
meals.description: 6oz salmon fillet baked with lemon and herbs, 1 large sweet potato roasted (cubed), 1.5 cups steamed green beans. Use olive oil for roasting.

meals.name: Large Oatmeal with Protein, Mixed Berries & Chia Seeds
meals.description: 1 cup (dry) quick oats cooked with water or milk, mixed with 1 scoop protein powder, topped with 1 cup mixed berries (fresh or frozen) and 1 tbsp chia seeds.

meals.name: Chicken and Veggie Rice Bowl
meals.description: 1.5 cups cooked brown rice, 6oz pan-fried chicken breast, 1.5 cups steamed mixed frozen vegetables, with 2 tbsp light soy-ginger dressing.

meals.name: Lentil Soup with Whole-Grain Bread
meals.description: Hearty lentil soup made with 1 cup dry lentils, 1 carrot, 1 celery stalk, 1/2 onion, 2 cups vegetable broth, 1/2 cup canned crushed tomatoes. Served with 2 slices whole-grain bread.

meals.name: Greek Yogurt with Granola and Apple
meals.description: 1.5 cups Greek yogurt topped with 1/2 cup granola and 1 large apple (sliced).

meals.name: Turkey and Hummus Wrap with Side Salad
meals.description: 2 large whole-wheat tortillas filled with 4oz sliced turkey breast, 1/4 cup hummus, lettuce, tomato, and cucumber. Side salad (2 cups mixed greens) with 2 tbsp vinaigrette.

meals.name: Sheet Pan Chicken and Veggies
meals.description: 6oz chicken thighs (boneless, skinless) or breast, roasted on a sheet pan with 1 bell pepper, 1 zucchini, 1/2 red onion, and 2 medium potatoes, all chopped and seasoned with olive oil and dried herbs.

meals.name: Protein Smoothie with Spinach, Banana & Peanut Butter
meals.description: Blend 1 cup milk, 1 scoop protein powder, 1 cup spinach, 1 banana, and 2 tbsp peanut butter.

meals.name: Leftover Sheet Pan Chicken and Veggies
meals.description: Reheated leftovers from Thursday's dinner.

meals.name: Homemade Whole Wheat Pizza with Chicken and Veggies
meals.description: 1 whole wheat pizza base, topped with 1/2 cup tomato sauce, 4oz cooked chicken pieces (from day 4 or fresh), 1/2 bell pepper, 1/2 onion, 1/2 cup mushrooms, and 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese.

meals.name: Protein Pancakes with Syrup and Mixed Berries
meals.description: 1 cup protein pancake mix (or equivalent homemade from flour/protein powder/egg), cooked and served with 2 tbsp maple syrup and 1 cup mixed berries.

meals.name: Large Tuna Salad Sandwich on Whole Wheat with Grapes
meals.description: Tuna salad made from 1 can (5 oz) tuna, 2 tbsp light mayo, 1/4 cup chopped celery, 1 tbsp chopped onion. Served on 3 slices whole wheat bread with 1 cup grapes.

meals.name: Chili Con Carne with Brown Rice and Greek Yogurt
meals.description: Chili made with 6oz lean ground beef, 1 can kidney beans, 1 cup canned crushed tomatoes, 1/2 onion, 2 cloves garlic, chili powder, cumin. Served over 1.5 cups cooked brown rice and topped with 1/4 cup Greek yogurt.

meals.name: Scrambled Eggs with Whole-Wheat Toast and Baked Beans
meals.description: 4 large scrambled eggs, 2 slices whole-wheat toast, 1 cup low-sugar baked beans.

meals.name: Chicken and Veggie Stir-fry with Brown Rice
meals.description: Stir-fry with 6oz chicken breast, 1 bell pepper, 1 cup broccoli florets, 1 cup snap peas, 2 tbsp soy-ginger stir-fry sauce. Served over 1.5 cups cooked brown rice.

meals.name: Turkey Meatloaf with Mashed Sweet Potatoes and Steamed Asparagus
meals.description: Meatloaf made from 6oz lean ground turkey, 1/4 cup oats/bread crumbs, 1 egg, 1/4 onion, 1 clove garlic, seasonings. Served with 2 medium mashed sweet potatoes (with a dash of milk/butter) and 1.5 cups steamed asparagus.

meals.name: Large Oatmeal with Protein Powder, Banana, and Nuts
meals.description: 80g rolled oats cooked with water or milk, mixed with 25g protein powder, topped with 1 large sliced banana and 20g mixed nuts.

meals.name: Chicken & Veggie Pasta Salad
meals.description: 120g dry whole wheat pasta, 150g cooked chicken breast, 200g mixed raw veggies (bell pepper, cucumber, cherry tomato), dressed with 2 tbsp olive oil and a splash of vinegar.

meals.name: Salmon with Roasted Sweet Potatoes and Broccoli
meals.description: 200g salmon fillet, 400g sweet potato wedges, and 200g broccoli florets, all roasted with 2 tbsp olive oil, seasoned with lemon and herbs.

meals.name: Scrambled Eggs with Spinach and Whole Wheat Toast
meals.description: 4 large eggs scrambled with a handful of spinach, served with 2 slices whole wheat toast and 1 tbsp butter/avocado.

meals.name: Large Tuna Salad Sandwich on Whole Wheat with side of Apple and Almonds
meals.description: 1 can tuna (in water, drained) mixed with 3 tbsp mayonnaise, celery, on 3 slices whole wheat bread. Side of 1 large apple and 40g almonds.

meals.name: Beef Stir-fry with Brown Rice
meals.description: 200g lean beef strips stir-fried with 200g mixed vegetables (carrots, bell peppers, snow peas) in a light soy-ginger sauce, served over 150g dry brown rice.

meals.name: Greek Yogurt with Granola, Berries, and Honey
meals.description: 400g plain Greek yogurt, 70g granola, 1 cup mixed berries, and 2 tbsp honey.

meals.name: Large Lentil Soup with Whole Wheat Bread
meals.description: A large bowl (approx. 600g) of hearty lentil soup, served with 3 slices whole wheat bread and 1 tbsp butter/avocado.

meals.name: Baked Chicken Thighs with Quinoa and Roasted Asparagus
meals.description: 250g skinless, boneless chicken thighs baked with herbs, served with 120g dry quinoa and 200g roasted asparagus with 1 tbsp olive oil.

meals.name: Large Oatmeal with Protein Powder, Apple, and Peanut Butter
meals.description: 80g rolled oats cooked with water or milk, 25g protein powder, 1 large apple (sliced), and 2 tbsp peanut butter.

meals.name: Large Turkey and Cheese Wrap with Hummus and Carrots
meals.description: 2 large whole wheat tortillas spread with 4 tbsp hummus, layered with 150g sliced turkey breast, 2 slices low-fat cheese, and mixed greens. Served with 1 cup baby carrots and 2 hard-boiled eggs.

meals.name: Ground Turkey and Black Bean Chili with Whole Wheat Tortilla Chips
meals.description: Lean ground turkey chili with black beans, corn, diced tomatoes, and spices, cooked with 1 tbsp olive oil. Served with 40g whole wheat tortilla chips and 2 tbsp Greek yogurt.

meals.name: Scrambled Eggs with Cheese and Whole Wheat Toast
meals.description: 4 large eggs scrambled with 1 slice low-fat cheese, served with 2 slices whole wheat toast and 1 tbsp butter/avocado.

meals.name: Large Mixed Green Salad with Canned Chickpeas, Feta, Olives, and Chicken
meals.description: Large bowl of mixed greens topped with 1 can chickpeas (drained), 50g feta cheese, 10 black olives, 150g grilled chicken. Dressed with 2 tbsp olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

meals.name: Pasta with Marinara Sauce, Ground Beef, and Zucchini
meals.description: 150g dry whole wheat pasta topped with 1.5 cups marinara sauce containing 200g lean ground beef and diced zucchini, cooked with 1 tbsp olive oil.

meals.name: Pancakes with Fruit and Syrup
meals.description: 4 whole wheat pancakes, topped with 1 cup mixed berries, 3 tbsp maple syrup and 1 tbsp butter.

meals.name: Homemade Personal Pizza
meals.description: 1 large whole wheat pita bread or pre-made crust topped with tomato sauce, 150g low-fat mozzarella cheese, 1 cup mixed vegetables (mushrooms, bell peppers), and 50g turkey pepperoni, with 1 tbsp olive oil.

meals.name: Baked Cod with Brown Rice and Green Beans
meals.description: 200g baked cod fillet seasoned with lemon and herbs, served with 150g dry brown rice and 200g steamed green beans, with 2 tbsp olive oil.

meals.name: Hearty Chicken & Avocado Whole Wheat Wraps
meals.description: Two large whole wheat tortillas generously filled with grilled chicken breast slices, half an avocado, cheddar cheese, mixed greens, and a creamy mayonnaise-based dressing. Use extra olive oil for cooking.

meals.name: Beef & Veggie Stir-fry with Brown Rice & Cashews
meals.description: A substantial portion of lean beef stir-fried with broccoli, bell peppers, and carrots in a soy-sesame sauce. Served over a large bed of brown rice and topped with a generous portion of cashews.

meals.name: High-Calorie Greek Yogurt Parfait
meals.description: A large serving of full-fat Greek yogurt layered generously with granola, mixed nuts, dried cranberries, and a drizzle of maple syrup for sustained energy.

meals.name: Tuna Pasta Salad with Olives & Feta
meals.description: A substantial portion of whole wheat pasta mixed with two cans of tuna in olive oil, chopped black olives, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and crumbled feta cheese, all dressed with extra olive oil and red wine vinegar.

meals.name: Loaded Sweet Potato with Chili & Cheese
meals.description: Two large baked sweet potatoes stuffed with hearty beef chili (made with ground beef, kidney beans, and diced tomatoes), topped generously with shredded cheddar cheese, a dollop of sour cream, and sliced green onions.

meals.name: Scrambled Eggs with Avocado Toast & Cheese
meals.description: A generous portion of 4-5 scrambled eggs cooked with a splash of whole milk, served alongside two thick slices of whole wheat toast topped with mashed avocado and a slice of melted cheddar cheese. Cook with butter or olive oil.

meals.name: Chicken & Hummus Pita Pockets with Quinoa Salad
meals.description: Two large pita breads stuffed with grilled chicken breast, a generous spread of hummus, cucumber slices, tomatoes, and crisp lettuce. Served with a side of quinoa salad (quinoa, chickpeas, bell peppers, lemon-tahini dressing).

meals.name: Lentil & Vegetable Curry with Coconut Rice
meals.description: A large bowl of hearty lentil and mixed vegetable (spinach, carrots, potatoes) curry, simmered in a coconut milk-based sauce. Served with a substantial portion of rice cooked with full-fat coconut milk for extra calories and flavor.

meals.name: Protein Pancakes with Banana & Nut Butter
meals.description: A large stack of protein pancakes (made with protein powder), topped with sliced banana, a generous dollop of peanut butter (or other nut butter), and a liberal drizzle of maple syrup for extra calories.

meals.name: Leftover Lentil & Vegetable Curry with Coconut Rice
meals.description: A generous portion of the previous night's hearty lentil and vegetable curry with coconut rice, ensuring it's a large, satisfying and calorie-dense meal.

meals.name: Salmon with Roasted Sweet Potatoes & Asparagus
meals.description: A large salmon fillet baked or pan-fried, served with a substantial portion of roasted sweet potato cubes (tossed generously in olive oil) and a side of roasted asparagus.

meals.name: Overnight Oats with Chia Seeds, Greek Yogurt & Berries
meals.description: Rolled oats soaked overnight in whole milk with chia seeds, topped with a large serving of full-fat Greek yogurt, mixed berries, and a sprinkle of chopped walnuts for added calories and nutrients.

meals.name: Hearty Chicken Noodle Soup with Crusty Bread & Butter
meals.description: A very large bowl of rich chicken noodle soup (homemade or good quality store-bought, packed with chicken and vegetables). Served with several thick slices of crusty bread slathered generously with butter.

meals.name: Beef Burgers with Cheese, Avocado & Sweet Potato Fries
meals.description: Two large beef patties (or one extra large) on whole wheat burger buns with cheddar cheese, sliced avocado, lettuce, and tomato. Accompanied by a large serving of homemade sweet potato fries baked with olive oil.

meals.name: Breakfast Burrito with Beans, Eggs, Cheese & Salsa
meals.description: Two large whole wheat tortillas generously filled with scrambled eggs (3-4 eggs), black beans, shredded cheddar cheese, and a dollop of salsa. Cooked with a generous amount of oil or butter for higher calories.

meals.name: Loaded Veggie & Hummus Sandwich with Avocado & Chips
meals.description: Two thick slices of whole wheat bread generously spread with hummus, layered with plenty of avocado slices, cucumber, tomatoes, spinach, and feta cheese. Served with a large bag of potato chips for extra calories.

meals.name: Chicken & Pesto Pasta with Sun-Dried Tomatoes & Pine Nuts
meals.description: A large serving of whole wheat pasta tossed with grilled chicken breast, a generous amount of pesto, sun-dried tomatoes (in oil), and a sprinkle of pine nuts for extra calories and flavor.

meals.name: Smoothie Bowl with Protein, Banana, Spinach & Nut Butter
meals.description: A thick smoothie bowl made with whole milk, protein powder, banana, spinach, and a large scoop of almond butter. Topped generously with granola and chia seeds for texture and added calories.

meals.name: Leftover Chicken & Pesto Pasta
meals.description: A generous portion of the previous night's delicious chicken and pesto pasta, ensuring a filling and high-calorie midday meal.

meals.name: Pork Chops with Mashed Potatoes & Gravy
meals.description: Two thick pork chops pan-seared or baked, served with a large portion of creamy mashed potatoes (made with whole milk and butter) and a rich gravy. A comforting and calorie-dense meal.

meals.name: Triple-Threat Power Oatmeal
meals.description: A very large bowl of oats cooked with whole milk and protein powder, topped generously with sliced banana, a quarter cup of chopped walnuts, 2 tablespoons of almond butter, and a drizzle of maple syrup for maximum calories and nutrients. Ensure a substantial portion to meet caloric needs.

meals.name: Loaded Chicken & Avocado Wraps (x2)
meals.description: Two large whole-wheat wraps packed with generous portions of cooked chicken breast (approx. 200g total), an entire sliced avocado, spinach, shredded cheddar cheese, and a spread of hummus or mayonnaise. Served with a side of high-calorie trail mix (nuts, seeds, dried fruit).

meals.name: Hearty Beef and Potato Bake
meals.description: A large portion of ground beef (200g) cooked with mixed vegetables (onions, carrots), seasoned well, then layered with thinly sliced potatoes (300g) and a generous sprinkle of cheese before baking until potatoes are tender and golden. Serve with a side salad dressed with olive oil.

meals.name: Giant Scrambled Eggs with Avocado Toast & Fruit
meals.description: Scrambled eggs made with 4 large eggs, cooked with a splash of whole milk and cheese. Served with 2 slices of thick whole-grain toast, each topped with a generous spread of mashed avocado (1 whole avocado total). Enjoy with a side of mixed berries and a glass of whole milk.

meals.name: Loaded Chicken Noodle Bowl with Peanut Sauce
meals.description: A large bowl of egg noodles (150g dry) mixed with generous portions of shredded cooked chicken (150g), steamed broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers. Dressed with a calorie-dense peanut sauce (peanut butter, soy sauce, lime juice, honey, sesame oil). Garnish with crushed peanuts.

meals.name: Hearty Lentil and Vegetable Curry with Rice
meals.description: A robust and calorie-rich lentil curry made with red lentils, coconut milk, diced sweet potatoes, spinach, and a medley of spices. Served with a very large portion (200g dry) of fluffy white or brown rice. Aim for a thick consistency for maximum caloric density.

meals.name: Massive Yogurt Parfait with Granola & Nuts
meals.description: A very large parfait made with 2 cups of full-fat Greek yogurt, layered generously with 1 cup of high-calorie granola, 1/2 cup mixed nuts (almonds, cashews), and 1/4 cup dried cranberries. Drizzle with honey or maple syrup. A protein shake (with full-fat milk and protein powder) on the side.

meals.name: Spicy Bean and Cheese Quesadillas (x2) with Guacamole
meals.description: Two large whole-wheat tortillas filled with a generous mixture of black beans, corn, diced bell peppers, and plenty of shredded Monterey Jack cheese. Grilled until golden and cheesy. Served with a big scoop of guacamole (made from 1 avocado) and sour cream for extra calories.

meals.name: Pasta with Meatballs and Rich Tomato Sauce
meals.description: A substantial serving of spaghetti or penne pasta (200g dry) tossed with a rich, calorie-dense homemade tomato sauce (made with olive oil, crushed tomatoes, herbs). Serve with 5-6 large meatballs (store-bought or homemade) and a generous sprinkle of grated Parmesan cheese.

shoppingItems.product: Ground Beef (for meatballs) or Store-bought Meatballs

meals.name: Protein-Packed Smoothie Bowl with Granola & Seeds
meals.description: A very thick smoothie bowl blended with 2 scoops of protein powder, 1 banana, 1 cup of frozen berries, 1 cup of whole milk, 2 tablespoons of almond butter, and 1/4 cup of whole oats. Topped with a large portion of granola, chia seeds, and pumpkin seeds for extra calories and texture.

meals.name: Giant Tuna Melt Sandwich (x2) with Chips
meals.description: Two large sandwiches made with thick slices of whole-wheat bread, generously filled with tuna mixed with plenty of mayonnaise, celery, and a layer of cheddar cheese, then grilled until melted. Served with a large bag of potato chips (e.g., 100g) for an energy boost.

meals.name: Chicken and Chickpea Tagine with Couscous
meals.description: A flavourful and calorie-dense tagine featuring large chunks of chicken thigh (250g), chickpeas, diced tomatoes, sweet potatoes, and a blend of North African spices. Served with a generous portion of fluffy couscous (150g dry), absorbing the rich sauce.

meals.name: Epic Breakfast Burrito (x2) with Hot Sauce
meals.description: Two large flour tortillas generously filled with scrambled eggs (4 large eggs), plenty of shredded cheese, sauted black beans, diced bell peppers, and a good dollop of sour cream or guacamole. Serve with your favorite hot sauce and a glass of whole milk.

meals.name: Leftover Chicken and Chickpea Tagine with Couscous
meals.description: A very large portion of the delicious and hearty chicken and chickpea tagine from yesterday's dinner, served with an ample side of couscous. This meal is designed for efficient, high-calorie consumption for a busy student.

meals.name: Pan-Seared Salmon with Roasted Potatoes and Asparagus
meals.description: Two substantial salmon fillets (approx. 180g each) pan-seared in olive oil until flaky. Served with a large portion of roasted baby potatoes (400g total), tossed with herbs and olive oil, and a generous side of steamed asparagus (seasoned with butter).

meals.name: Big Breakfast Sandwich Stack
meals.description: A stack of 3 slices of whole-grain bread, layered with 3 fried eggs, 3 slices of cheese, and 3 slices of deli ham or turkey bacon. Spread generously with avocado or mayonnaise for extra calories. Serve with a large glass of orange juice and a handful of almonds.

meals.name: Creamy Tuna Pasta Salad
meals.description: A large bowl of pasta salad made with 150g dry pasta (e.g., fusilli or rotini), 2 cans of tuna (in oil, drained), peas, diced celery, and a very creamy dressing made from mayonnaise and full-fat Greek yogurt. Season well and chill. This is a very calorie-dense and easy-to-prepare meal.

meals.name: Giant Chicken and Vegetable Stir-fry with Rice
meals.description: A very large stir-fry with 250g chicken breast or thigh, plenty of mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers, snow peas, carrots), and a rich sauce made from soy sauce, honey, sesame oil, and cornstarch. Served over a substantial portion of white or brown rice (200g dry).

meals.name: Pancakes or Waffles Stack with Bacon & Maple Syrup
meals.description: A tall stack of 4-5 large pancakes or waffles, served with 4-5 slices of crispy bacon or sausage patties. Drench generously with maple syrup and a large dollop of butter. Enjoy with a protein shake made with whole milk.

meals.name: Leftover Giant Chicken and Vegetable Stir-fry with Rice
meals.description: Another substantial portion of the delicious and high-calorie chicken and vegetable stir-fry with rice from yesterday's dinner. This makes for a convenient and filling lunch, ensuring sustained energy and caloric intake.

meals.name: Spicy Pork and Peanut Noodles
meals.description: A very large bowl of thick noodles (e.g., udon or ramen, 200g dry) tossed with ground pork (200g), a generous amount of crunchy peanut butter, soy sauce, chili garlic sauce, and a mix of bell peppers and green onions. High in protein and healthy fats.

meals.name: Hearty Protein Oatmeal with Berries & Almond Butter
meals.description: Creamy rolled oats cooked with milk, mixed with protein powder, topped with fresh mixed berries and a dollop of almond butter for a filling and protein-rich start.

meals.name: Large Tuna Salad Sandwich with Veggies & Apple
meals.description: Flaked tuna mixed with light mayonnaise and diced celery, served on four slices of whole wheat bread with lettuce and tomato. Accompanied by baby carrots and a large apple.

meals.name: Chicken Stir-fry with Brown Rice
meals.description: Sauted chicken breast strips with a generous mix of colorful stir-fry vegetables (broccoli, carrots, bell peppers, snap peas) in a light soy and sesame oil sauce, served over fluffy brown rice.

meals.name: Greek Yogurt Parfait with Granola, Banana & Honey
meals.description: Layers of creamy plain Greek yogurt, crunchy granola, sliced banana, and a drizzle of honey for a balanced and energizing breakfast.

meals.name: Leftover Chicken Stir-fry with Brown Rice
meals.description: A generous portion of the delicious chicken stir-fry from Day 1, perfect for a convenient and hearty lunch.

meals.name: Beef & Bean Chili with Whole Wheat Tortilla & Avocado
meals.description: Hearty and flavorful chili made with lean ground beef, kidney beans, crushed tomatoes, and spices, served with a warm whole wheat tortilla and topped with sliced avocado.

meals.name: Power Protein Smoothie
meals.description: A nutrient-packed smoothie blending protein powder, spinach, banana, frozen mixed berries, almond milk, and almond butter for sustained energy.

meals.name: Chickpea & Feta Salad with Whole Wheat Bread
meals.description: A fresh and filling salad with mixed greens, chickpeas, crumbled feta cheese, cucumber, tomatoes, and bell pepper, dressed with olive oil and red wine vinegar, served with whole wheat bread.

meals.name: Baked Chicken Thighs with Quinoa & Roasted Asparagus
meals.description: Juicy baked boneless, skinless chicken thighs seasoned with herbs, served with fluffy quinoa and tender roasted asparagus.

meals.name: Scrambled Eggs with Spinach, Whole Wheat Toast & Avocado
meals.description: Fluffy scrambled eggs mixed with fresh spinach, served with two slices of whole wheat toast and half an avocado.

meals.name: Leftover Chicken Thighs & Quinoa
meals.description: A substantial serving of the baked chicken thighs and quinoa from Day 3, making for a convenient and protein-rich lunch.

meals.name: Hearty Lentil Soup with Crusty Whole Grain Bread
meals.description: A comforting lentil soup with carrots, celery, and onion in a flavorful vegetable broth, seasoned with herbs, served with a slice of crusty whole grain bread.

meals.name: Large Smoothie Bowl with Granola & Chia Seeds
meals.description: A thick smoothie bowl made with frozen berries, banana, protein powder, and almond milk, topped with crunchy granola and chia seeds for a satisfying breakfast.

meals.name: Hummus & Veggie Wraps (2) with Fruit & Nuts
meals.description: Two whole wheat tortillas generously spread with hummus and loaded with fresh mixed greens, cucumber, carrots, and bell pepper slices. Served with a large apple, an orange, and a handful of almonds.

meals.name: Sheet Pan Chicken Sausage & Roasted Vegetables
meals.description: A simple and delicious sheet pan meal with sliced pre-cooked chicken sausage, diced sweet potatoes, broccoli, bell peppers, and onion, all roasted with olive oil and spices until tender and slightly caramelized.

meals.name: Cottage Cheese with Pineapple, Whole Grain Crackers & Pecans
meals.description: Creamy cottage cheese topped with juicy pineapple chunks, served with whole grain crackers and a handful of pecans for added crunch and healthy fats.

meals.name: Large Tuna Salad Wrap with Mixed Greens & Baby Carrots
meals.description: A large and satisfying whole wheat tortilla filled with tuna mixed with light mayonnaise and celery, fresh mixed greens, and cucumber. Served with baby carrots on the side.

meals.name: Ground Turkey & Black Bean Tacos with Toppings
meals.description: Flavorful ground turkey seasoned and mixed with black beans, served in warm whole wheat tortillas with fresh salsa, sliced avocado, a dollop of plain Greek yogurt, and a sprinkle of shredded cheese.

meals.name: Protein Pancakes with Maple Syrup & Mixed Berries
meals.description: Fluffy protein pancakes (prepared from mix or scratch), lightly drizzled with maple syrup and topped with fresh mixed berries.

meals.name: Leftover Ground Turkey & Black Bean Tacos/Bowl
meals.description: A generous portion of the delicious ground turkey and black bean filling from Day 6, either served in tortillas or as a bowl with extra greens.

meals.name: Pesto Chicken Pasta with Cherry Tomatoes & Spinach
meals.description: Whole wheat pasta tossed with tender chicken breast, vibrant pesto, juicy cherry tomatoes, and fresh spinach, finished with a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese.

meals.name: Hearty Protein Oatmeal with Berries, Nuts, Seeds & Full-Fat Milk
meals.description: A very substantial and energizing start to the day with this version (cqhznf1283r), packed with protein, healthy fats, and complex carbs. Made with rolled oats, full-fat milk, whey protein, mixed berries, walnuts, almonds, and chia seeds.

meals.name: Large Chicken & Avocado Pasta Salad with Feta & Olive Oil Vinaigrette
meals.description: A robust pasta salad featuring a generous portion of cooked pasta, chicken breast, an entire avocado, crumbled feta cheese, sundried tomatoes, mixed greens, and a rich olive oil vinaigrette.

meals.name: Beef Stir-fry with Basmati Rice, Cashews, and Extra Sesame Oil
meals.description: A flavourful and calorie-dense stir-fry with lean beef strips, plenty of basmati rice, a large serving of cashews for extra calories and crunch, and a mix of colorful stir-fry vegetables, all coated in a soy and sesame oil sauce.

meals.name: Scrambled Eggs with Cheese on Whole Wheat Toast, Avocado, and a Large Fruit Smoothie with Protein
meals.description: A protein-rich breakfast featuring several scrambled eggs with cheddar cheese on thick whole wheat toast, a full avocado, and a large smoothie made with banana, spinach, protein powder, full-fat milk, and peanut butter.

meals.name: Loaded Tuna Melt Sandwich with Chips and a Side Salad, plus Greek Yogurt with Honey & Nuts
meals.description: A substantial tuna melt on rye bread with plenty of cheese, served with a large portion of potato chips and a side salad. Followed by full-fat Greek yogurt topped with honey and almonds for extra calories and protein.

meals.name: Hearty Lamb Shepherd's Pie with Sweet Potato Topping and Green Beans
meals.description: A comforting and high-calorie shepherd's pie made with seasoned ground lamb and vegetables in a rich gravy, topped with a generous layer of creamy sweet potato mash. Served with a side of fresh green beans. (Portion for two meals)

meals.name: Peanut Butter & Banana Protein Pancakes with Maple Syrup and Full-Fat Milk
meals.description: Fluffy pancakes made with protein powder, enriched with mashed banana and peanut butter, served with plenty of maple syrup and a large glass of full-fat milk for an energy-packed start.

meals.name: Leftover Hearty Lamb Shepherd's Pie
meals.description: A substantial portion of the delicious and hearty Lamb Shepherd's Pie from Day 2, perfect for a quick and satisfying lunch.

meals.name: Chicken Curry with Coconut Milk, Rice, and Naan Bread
meals.description: A rich and creamy chicken curry made with chicken thighs, full-fat coconut milk, and aromatic spices, served with a large portion of basmati rice and warm naan bread for soaking up the sauce.

meals.name: Creamy Rice Pudding with Dried Fruits and Crushed Pistachios
meals.description: A comforting and energy-dense rice pudding made with Arborio rice and full-fat milk, sweetened and enriched with dried apricots, raisins, and topped with crushed pistachios.

meals.name: Large Pulled Pork Sandwich with Coleslaw and Sweet Potato Fries
meals.description: A generously sized pulled pork sandwich on a brioche bun with tangy coleslaw, served with a side of crispy sweet potato fries. (Pulled pork for two meals)

meals.name: Salmon Fillet with Quinoa, Roasted Asparagus, and a Lemon-Dill Butter Sauce
meals.description: A healthy yet calorie-rich dinner featuring a large salmon fillet, a substantial serving of quinoa, tender roasted asparagus, all drizzled with a decadent lemon-dill butter sauce.

meals.name: Greek Yogurt Bowl with Granola, Mixed Berries, Honey, and Almond Butter
meals.description: A large bowl of full-fat Greek yogurt loaded with crunchy granola, mixed berries, a generous drizzle of honey, and a big dollop of almond butter for extra calories and protein.

meals.name: Leftover Pulled Pork Sandwich
meals.description: Another hearty pulled pork sandwich using the leftovers from Day 4, served on a fresh brioche bun for a quick and filling lunch.

meals.name: Chicken and Veggie Skewers with Large Baked Potato and Sour Cream
meals.description: Flavorful chicken and vegetable skewers (bell peppers, zucchini, red onion) grilled or baked, accompanied by a very large baked potato topped with sour cream, ensuring a high-calorie and satisfying meal.

meals.name: Breakfast Burrito with Scrambled Eggs, Sausage, Cheese, Black Beans, and Avocado
meals.description: A massive breakfast burrito packed with scrambled eggs, savory breakfast sausage, melted cheddar cheese, protein-rich black beans, and a generous portion of avocado, served in a large flour tortilla.

meals.name: Hearty Lentil Soup with Crusty Bread and Full-Fat Cottage Cheese
meals.description: A thick and hearty lentil soup, rich in plant-based protein and fiber, served with several slices of crusty bread and a large side of full-fat cottage cheese for added protein and calories.

meals.name: Homemade Pizza (Large) with Meat & Veggie Toppings, Extra Cheese, and Side Salad
meals.description: A very large homemade pizza on a pre-made dough base, loaded with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, ham, bell peppers, and mushrooms. Accompanied by a side salad with a rich olive oil and balsamic dressing.

meals.name: Brioche French Toast with Bacon, Maple Syrup, and Full-Fat Greek Yogurt
meals.description: Indulgent French toast made with rich brioche bread, served with crispy bacon, generous maple syrup, and a side of full-fat Greek yogurt for added protein and creaminess.

meals.name: Loaded Veggie & Hummus Wrap with Feta, Olives, and a side of Trail Mix
meals.description: A large wrap filled with creamy hummus, an abundance of fresh vegetables, crumbled feta cheese, and Kalamata olives. Paired with a substantial serving of calorie-dense trail mix.

meals.name: Large Batch Chili Con Carne with Rice, Cornbread, and Sour Cream
meals.description: A hearty and flavorful chili con carne, packed with ground beef, kidney beans, tomatoes, and spices. Served with a large portion of white rice, cornbread, and a dollop of cooling sour cream.
